name: Scallop Cakes With Artichoke Hearts
keywords: appetizer, artichoke, scallops, dairy-free, nut-free, spring, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 artichoke hearts, cooked until tender, cooled and coarsely chopped
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. With slightly moistened hands, form the mixture into 8 cakes, each about 1/2 inch thick.

Coat a large nonstick skillet lightly with oil. Heat over medium-low heat until hot. Add as many fish cakes as will comfortably fit in pan. Cook until nicely browned on both sides and scallops are cooked through, about 4 minutes per side.
